EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Rutland County Council
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for raising a call on our FixMyStreet service which we have now received.
You can see the details of your call at the folowing link:
https://rutland.fixmystreet.com/report/{!FixMyStreet__c.ServiceReqId__c}
The details of your call are:
Title: {!FixMyStreet__c.title__c} FixMyStreet Reference: {!FixMyStreet__c.service_request_id__c} RCC Customer Services Reference: {!FixMyStreet__c.Case_Number__c} Date Raised: {!FixMyStreet__c.requested_datetime__c}
We will provide updates to FixMyStreet.
Thanks you for using this service.
